channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Group Sharing
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Group Sharing

item.title: CVE-2022-36865|2024-08-03T10:14:28.882Z -- samsung%20mobile -- group%20sharing
item.description: Improper access control in Group Sharing prior to versions 13.0.6.15 in Android S(12), 13.0.6.14 in Android R(11) and below allows attackers to access device information.

item.title: CVE-2021-25504|2024-08-03T20:03:05.736Z -- samsung%20mobile -- group%20sharing
item.description: Intent redirection vulnerability in Group Sharing prior to 10.8.03.2 allows attacker to access contact information.

item.title: CVE-2022-36866|2024-08-03T10:14:28.911Z -- samsung%20mobile -- group%20sharing
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in Broadcaster in Group Sharing prior to versions 13.0.6.15 in Android S(12), 13.0.6.14 in Android R(11) and below allows attackers to identify the device.

item.title: CVE-2022-39877|2024-08-03T12:07:43.010Z -- samsung%20mobile -- group%20sharing
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in ProfileSharingAccount in Group Sharing prior to versions 13.0.6.15 in Android S(12), 13.0.6.14 in Android R(11) and below allows attackers to identify the device.
